meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7894.

td.p: Kathryn Kienholz, a retired CPA from Milltown, Wisconsin
Heath Herel, a ScrumMaster from Niantic, Connecticut
Jon Barber, an investment professional from San Francisco, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,999)

tr.td: CONFUSING LYRICS
AIRPORT CODES
ALLITERATIVE PEOPLE
STUCK ON EWE
"GLASS" WORKS
BOWL GAME SPONSORS
(Alex: Once-upon-a-time sponsors and current sponsors.)

Heath

ON THE HEAVENLY BODY

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: One of the countries is an easy get, the other one more difficult, I feel.)
...
(Alex, to Jon: You got [*], and it looks like you were going for [*]. You\'re wrong with your response because it\'s incomplete.)
JonWhat are Chile & Pe
$2,400
HeathWhat are Chile and Peru
$4,200
KathrynWhat are Chile & Peru?
$9,000
Chile and Peru')

Jon
Heath
Kathryn

2nd place: $2,000

Kathryn

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
